RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE AUGUST 22, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claim ing Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROTHER SKYE away alertly, set a pressured pace into the stretch then drew off under mild left handed urging to win as much the best. YOU ARE AWESOME hopped at the start, vied for the lead three wide, dug in late in the four path and got up for second. STAY THIRSTY AMIGO had good early speed inside, checked when in tight entering the stretch, shifted out three wide past the quarter pole and closed a gap late. EXONERATED PREZ pressed the pace three wide and was outfinished. TWICE AS SMART broke slowly, rushed to contention four wide, loomed boldly midway on the turn then weakened larte. T MONEY trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Stay Thirsty Amigo
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked rail 3/8 pole, late gain, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Brother Skye
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Twice as Smart
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, rushed to contention, 4 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: You Are Awesome
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, vied 3 wide, up place, 4path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 28. Maiden Claiming Purse 18900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOHN PHILIP trailed five wide down the backstretch, closed willingly four wide through deep stretch and was along in time. BIG TIME FLIRT vied for the lead into the turn, loomed boldly three wide near the fix sixteenths pole, battled until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. NIKAO pressed the pace two wide and was outfinished. SOMETHING ON TAP set a pressured pace along the inside until deep stretch then was outfinished. AGNELLO CITY failed to menace. STRIKING AGAIN settled four wide and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Time Flirt
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, loomed boldly 3 wide, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: John Philip
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed 5 wide, closed willingly, 4 wide, in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 50. Claiming Purse 19400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,50 0.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I'M JAC'D chased the leader through the turn, rallied in the six path under mild right handed urging to make the lead in deep stretch and drew off under a strong hand ride. MAP TO MY HEART sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set the pace into the stretch, drifted to the five path then was no match for the winner and returned bleeding from the nostrils. DEE'S KY WILDCAT trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals inside. GHOSTLY REVIVAL stalked the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. BIRDIE'S CHANTZ failed to menace. HEART OF RUBY was no threat. BUSYBEING FABULOUS had speed five wide into the turn then gave way. FRIENDLY MERGER flashed speed and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Jac'd
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, rallied 2 wide, 6path, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Map to My Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace, drifted 5path, no match winner, bled

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 22, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,50 0.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIGER TRAIL vied for the early lead along the inside, shifted out three wide on the turn, rallied to make the lead near the furlong marker and proved best under strong handling. JACK BE FAST pressed the pace two wide into the turn, gained a narrow lead nearing the quarter pole then finished second best. SHOW SLIDING HOME never far back, loomed boldly four wide near the quarter pole then was outfinished. THE MAN CAN failed to menace. PRECIOUS JULES was never close. FOREIGN set a pressured pace along the inside to the quarter pole, had speed into the stretch and stopped late.

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger Trail
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, angled out turn, rallied 3 wide, 5path, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Foreign
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside 1/4 pole, stopped late

ENTRY.NAME: Jack Be Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE AUGUST 22, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claim ing Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE DRAKE trailed through the far turn, circled his field under right handed urging through the stretch, made the lead late and was taken in hand nearing the wire. FISHING FOR FUN dueled for the lead along the inside into the stretch, shook clear before the furlong marker then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. LUCKY ANDY contested the lead two wide into the stretch and weakened late. UNIDENTIFIED MAN vied for the lead three wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Fishing for Fun
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, shook clear upper stretch, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: The Drake
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled field right handed urging, in hand late

ENTRY.NAME: Unidentified Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 52. Claiming Purse 20800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STARS N SPACE broke in full stride to set all the pace and widened through the stretch to win as much the best under confident handling. TURBO POWER chased the winner and was no match while second best in the six path. ORLEANS STORM went evenly. NOSEY POWER passed tiring rivals. GRANDE RED bobbled at the start, had good early speed along the inside then faded. MARCH MAGIC was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Grande Red
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, good early speed, inside, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Stars N Space
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, much the best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 22 Allowed 4 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT IN OHIO bobbled then was bumped by the runner up at the start, rushed to the front soon thereafter, set all the pace, drifted to the four path entering the stretch and drew away late under brisk handling. WORTHERWEIGHTNGOLD broke outward bumping the winner at the start, chased that one into the stretch, drew closer outside nearing the furlong marker then was no match while well clear for second. TEAM GOLD DIGGER close up three wide, went evenly. QUARANTINA was no factor. NO TWOWAYSABOUTIT was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Wortherweightngold
ENTRY.OWNER: Fairwinds Farm and Shafer, Steve D.
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased, outside bid, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight in Ohio
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Snow Racing Stables and Boots N Bikinis LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, brumped start, rushed to lead, repulsed bid, drew off,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 58. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 22, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 22 Allowed 4 lbs. C laiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARMEN OHIO stalked the pace three wide into the stretch, responded readily when set down, made the lead under right handed urging inside the furlong marker and drew off. SWEET EMPIRE away alertly, set the pace along the inside until deep stretch then was no match for the winner. VICTOR STORY never far back, finished determinedly in the five path. FRONT CIRCLE close up from the start, offered a mild bid along the inside at the quarter pole, angled out to the three path then came up empty. GAIL'S DANCER was no factor. SWINDLE pressed the pace two wide and was through after a half. PERSEVERING HONOR was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Front Circle
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move inside, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Swindle
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Carmen Ohio
ENTRY.OWNER: Royer Family Stables LLC and Aurora Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, right urging, drew off,
